thread.title: 21 Times Gabrielle Union and Dwyane Wade Reminded Us Why Black Love Rocks
thread.title_full: 21 Times Gabrielle Union and Dwyane Wade Reminded Us Why Black Love Rocks

author: Brianna Holt
title: 21 Times Gabrielle Union and Dwyane Wade Reminded Us Why Black Love Rocks
text:
Trust me, I love it too. ID: 10491019 5. Or the time Dwyane showed off a naked Gabi on his Instagram for her birthday. Loading View on Instagram
Hard to believe this woman is 44.
ID: 10491524 6. The time they did the #SoGoneChallenge and it actually ate! Loading View on Instagram
Bars, on bars, on bars.
ID: 10491586 7. Or the time Dwyane made it rain roses all over their hotel suite for Valentine’s Day. View this image ›
@Dwyanewade / Via instagram.com What do I have to do to deserve this?
ID: 10491670 8. We certainly can’t forget the time they got freaky on Snapchat and you could not help but watch more than once. Snapchat: Mrdwyanewade / Via youtube.com
ID: 10498762 9. Every Christmas they remind us that our family Christmas photos really ain’t shit. Loading View on Instagram
ID: 10491120 10. And not to mention, their New Year’s photos. Loading View on Instagram
Should I start taking New Year’s photos?
ID: 10491770 11. They share an equal amount of sauce. GabUnion / Via instagram.com , GabUnion / Via instagram.com ID: 10491141 12. And they put in the work to make sure that the other person has an Instagram-worthy photo. Loading View on Instagram
ID: 10491434 13. Their stunt game is on another level. Loading View on Instagram
ID: 10491130 14. And they constantly throw harmless shade at each other. Loading View on Instagram
ID: 10491249 15. Despite their busy schedules, they always make time for traveling. GabUnion / Via instagram.com
Gabunion / Via instagram.com
 ID: 10501674 16. Couples that workout together… View this image ›
Gabunion / Via instagram.com ID: 10491820 17. …look like Gabrielle Union and Dwyane Wade. View this image ›
GabUnion / Via instagram.com ID: 10491468 18. He’s a Being Mary Jane fan. View this image ›
Dwyanewade / Via instagram.com ID: 10491132 19. And she’s a die-hard Bulls fan. View this image ›
Mike Ehrmann / Getty Images ID: 10491134 20. Each time they show off their love on Instagram, we secretly envy them. Loading View on Instagram
ID: 10491135 21. And in a world full of fakes, their love sure does look genuine. Loading View on Instagram
ID: 10491178
